channel.title: RuneScape Clients for Mac
channel.description:
Okay, I've asked this question millions of times, and I'm going to take one last shot at it.
[b]Is there a way for me to run a RuneScape private server client besides MoparScape, Dodian, and Silab, on the Mac?[/b]
I don't need you to tell me that batch files are meant for Windows. I need you to tell me how to get into the class files and how I can make an [i]executable[/i] JAR out of them.
Again, i know that batch files are meant for DOS-based operating systems. Again, I KNOW THAT BATCH FILES ARE MEANT FOR DOS-BASED OPERATING SYSTEMS!!!

item.title: RuneScape Clients for Mac
item.dc:creator: @God_of_Rock God of Rock
item.description:
@God_of_Rock wrote:

m.dog311:

It’s the same in Mac as it is in any other OS. The commands are all the same, it’s put together all the same (well, with a few minor changes).

So how do I open it in Terminal? When I double-click it, I get a bunch of error messages.

cocoa:

http://csdl.ics.hawaii.edu/~johnson/613f99/modules/04/jar-files.html

What’s the main-class?

Read full topic
